prompts.title: FAQ Section for Product
prompts.content:
Create a clear and informative FAQ section for {{productName}}.

1. Question: What is {{productName}}?
   Answer: Provide a concise explanation of the product's key features and uses.
2. Question: How do I use {{productName}}?
   Answer: Detail the basic usage instructions for the product.
3. Question: What are the benefits of using {{productName}}?
   Answer: Highlight the main advantages and value for the user.
4. Question: Is there a warranty on {{productName}}?
   Answer: Specify the warranty information, including coverage and duration.
5. Question: How do I return {{productName}}?
   Answer: Provide return instructions and the process for returns.

Target Audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
Language: {{language}}
prompts.description: Draft an informative FAQ section for a specific product, covering the most common customer queries.

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target audience for the FAQ section

variables.name: tone
variables.description: Tone of the FAQ (e.g., formal, casual, friendly)

prompts.title: FAQ Section for Service
prompts.content:
Write a detailed FAQ section for the service {{serviceName}}.

1. Question: What is {{serviceName}}?
   Answer: Provide a clear description of the service.
2. Question: How does {{serviceName}} work?
   Answer: Explain the process or steps involved in using the service.
3. Question: What is the cost of {{serviceName}}?
   Answer: State the pricing structure for the service.
4. Question: Can I cancel {{serviceName}} anytime?
   Answer: Describe the cancellation policy, if applicable.
5. Question: How do I contact support for {{serviceName}}?
   Answer: Provide contact details or methods for customer support.

Target Audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
Language: {{language}}
prompts.description: Create a helpful FAQ section for a service, addressing common questions and concerns.

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target audience for the FAQ section

variables.name: tone
variables.description: Tone of the FAQ (e.g., professional, friendly, casual)

prompts.title: FAQ Section for Software
prompts.content:
Write a FAQ section for the software product {{softwareName}}.

1. Question: What is {{softwareName}}?
   Answer: Describe the software, its main functionality, and use cases.
2. Question: How do I install {{softwareName}}?
   Answer: Provide step-by-step installation instructions.
3. Question: Is there a free trial available for {{softwareName}}?
   Answer: Explain the availability and length of any free trials.
4. Question: How do I upgrade my subscription for {{softwareName}}?
   Answer: Outline the process for upgrading to a higher tier.
5. Question: Can I get support for {{softwareName}}?
   Answer: Provide contact information for customer support or troubleshooting.

Target Audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
Language: {{language}}
prompts.description: Create an informative FAQ section for a software product, addressing common questions users may have.

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target audience for the FAQ section

variables.name: tone
variables.description: Tone of the FAQ (e.g., technical, professional, casual)

prompts.title: FAQ Section for Online Course
prompts.content:
Create a FAQ section for an online course titled {{courseTitle}}.

1. Question: What is {{courseTitle}}?
   Answer: Provide a concise description of the course content and objectives.
2. Question: How do I enroll in {{courseTitle}}?
   Answer: Explain the enrollment process, including any prerequisites.
3. Question: What will I learn in {{courseTitle}}?
   Answer: List the key skills or knowledge areas covered in the course.
4. Question: Is there a certification upon completion of {{courseTitle}}?
   Answer: Specify whether the course offers certification and details of it.
5. Question: How do I contact the instructor of {{courseTitle}}?
   Answer: Provide contact details or instructions for reaching out to the instructor.

Target Audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
Language: {{language}}
prompts.description: Write an FAQ section for an online course, answering common questions related to course content and enrollment.

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target audience for the FAQ section

variables.name: tone
variables.description: Tone of the FAQ (e.g., motivational, informative, welcoming)

prompts.title: FAQ Section for E-commerce Website
prompts.content:
Write a FAQ section for the e-commerce website {{websiteName}}.

1. Question: How do I place an order on {{websiteName}}?
   Answer: Provide the steps for ordering on the site, from selection to checkout.
2. Question: What payment methods are accepted on {{websiteName}}?
   Answer: List the available payment options.
3. Question: How do I track my order from {{websiteName}}?
   Answer: Explain how customers can track their orders after purchase.
4. Question: How can I return an item from {{websiteName}}?
   Answer: Provide the return policy and instructions.
5. Question: Do you offer international shipping on {{websiteName}}?
   Answer: Clarify if international shipping is available and any relevant details.

Target Audience: {{audience}}
Tone: {{tone}}
Language: {{language}}
prompts.description: Write an FAQ section for an e-commerce website, covering common customer questions related to ordering, payment, and returns.

variables.name: audience
variables.description: Target audience for the FAQ section

variables.name: tone
variables.description: Tone of the FAQ (e.g., casual, customer-friendly, professional)
